Returns contacts business unit mapping definition for the identified (id).

GetContactSensitiveDataMaskingConfig.description: Returns the configuration of contact sensitive data masking for the account, primarily indicating whether it's enabled or not.

EnableContactSensitiveDataMasking.description: Enables or disables contact sensitive data masking for the account when the configuration value of 'enable' is set to true or false, respectively.
